definition: The term "leere" refers to the absence or lack of something, often used to describe an empty or vacant state. It is commonly employed to depict an empty space, void, or the condition of being devoid of content or substance. This word is frequently utilized to describe physical emptiness, as well as metaphorical or emotional emptiness.

examples.german: Sie leerte den Inhalt der Schublade.
examples.english: She emptied the contents of the drawer.

examples.german: Die leere Seite des Buches war unbeschrieben.
examples.english: The blank page of the book was unwritten.
